title: Climate Sustainability | Topics |
author: unknown
text: April 4, 2025 Global | Geoeconomic Fragmentation, a Vulnerability for the Climate Transition The geoeconomic fragmentation triggered by geopolitical concerns makes climate transitions more vulnerable, for example in the EU, which depends on politically distant suppliers of decarbonization inputs, or in emerging economies, which rely on external flows of sustainable finance. Types of files Downloads: Files
